GRAND MUSICAL P E R F O R M A N C E
DURING LENT.
" T H E Public is most respectfully informed, that the G R A M ) PERFORMANCE OP
MUSIC, LAST NIGHT, at the THEATRE ROYAL, DRUUYLANE, was received jby a brilliant,
fashionable, and crowded Audience, with the most enthusiastic applause !
" THE SECOND REPRESENTATION WILL TAKE PLACE AT T H E

Theatre Royals Coveef G a r d e n
On WEDJSESDA

Y next, Ee6. 23rd, 1831,

Under the Immediate Direction of BE?. ALEX A ^ P E R LEE

G. P. HANDEL'S SACRED ORATORIO, THE

MESSIAH.

DURING LENT.
THE Public is most respectfully informed, that the GRAND PERFORMANCE O F
ARTSIC, on Friday last, at the THEATRE ROYAL, DRURY LANE, was received by a brilliant,
f sjiionable, and crowded Audience, with the most enthusiastic applause!

W i t h t h e W h o l e of the MUSIC, composed b y AUBBK,
